meta.title: About — Freelancer / Portfolio Templates
meta.description: About us — we design and build polished portfolio templates for freelancers.

hero.title: We make beautiful portfolios for freelancers
hero.subtitle: Fast. Accessible. SEO-ready.
hero.desc: Our templates are crafted to help independent professionals showcase work, win clients and focus on what matters — the work itself. We combine design systems, performance best-practices and clear documentation so you can ship fast.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.desc: We help freelancers present their work with clarity and confidence. Our goal is to reduce the friction of going live — design, code, and docs that let you focus on projects rather than setup.

speed.title: Speed
speed.desc: Ship quickly with prebuilt components and clear docs.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.desc: Built with semantic markup and inclusive patterns.

seo.title: SEO & Performance
seo.desc: Optimized markup, fast loads, and sensible defaults.

meta.title: Frontend Development — Services
meta.description: Frontend development services: modern React/Next.js apps, performance optimization, responsive UIs, accessibility and deployment.

hero.title: Build Fast, Maintainable Frontends.
hero.desc: We build modern React and Next.js frontends focused on performance, accessibility, and developer experience — from interactive UI to production-ready deployment pipelines.

performance.title: Performance & SSR
performance.desc: Optimized builds, server-side rendering, and bundle tuning for fast load times.

reusable.title: Component Implementation
reusable.desc: Production-ready React components, primitives and design-consistent UI building blocks.

tooling.title: Tooling & Testing
tooling.desc: Automated testing, linting, and CI pipelines to keep releases stable.

accessibility.title: Accessibility & SEO
accessibility.desc: Semantic markup, ARIA, and SEO best practices baked in.

preview.preview_desc: A short preview of an implemented page showing responsive layout, lazy images and interactive UI.

scope.title: Frontend Scope & Deliverables
scope.desc: What you get when we deliver a frontend: production-ready components, optimized pages, and deployment-ready code.

timeline.title: Project timeline
timeline.desc: Typical engagement: 1–4 weeks depending on scope. Work is split into Discovery, Implementation, and QA/Deployment with milestones for reviews and user testing.
timeline.note: Includes performance audit, accessibility checks and CI setup.

meta.title: SEO & Performance — Services
meta.description: SEO and performance optimization services: Core Web Vitals, Lighthouse tuning, caching, image optimization and analytics for measurable traffic growth.

hero.title: Faster Pages, More Traffic.
hero.desc: Improve load times and search visibility with targeted performance and SEO work — Core Web Vitals, Lighthouse tuning, optimized media, and measurable analytics.

performance.title: Core Web Vitals
performance.desc: Reduce CLS, LCP and TTFB with prioritized fixes and monitoring.

reusable.title: Lighthouse & Audits
reusable.desc: Full-site audits, prioritized recommendations and remediation for accessibility, performance and SEO.

tooling.title: Image & Cache Optimization
tooling.desc: Next-gen images, proper cache headers and CDN strategies for repeat visits and fast UX.

accessibility.title: Analytics & Monitoring
accessibility.desc: Track Core Web Vitals, set up real-user monitoring and conversion analytics for data-driven decisions.

preview.preview_desc: A condensed view of audit results, Lighthouse scores and recommendations applied to a sample page.

scope.title: SEO & Performance Scope & Deliverables
scope.desc: What you get: audits, prioritized fixes, optimized assets and monitoring setup to track improvements over time.

deliverables.title: SEO & Performance Deliverables
deliverables.desc: Actionable improvements and deliverables to make your site faster, more discoverable, and more reliable in search.

items.cdn: CDN, cache headers and bundling strategy
items.analytics: Analytics and RUM setup for monitoring

timeline.title: Project Timeline
timeline.desc: Typical engagement: 1–3 weeks for audits and quick wins, longer for full remediation and monitoring setup. We break work into Audit, Fixes, and Monitoring phases.
timeline.note: Includes a prioritized action plan, before/after metrics and 30 days of performance monitoring.
